description: This Kotlin source file defines a utility object 'Notation' responsible for generating Standard Algebraic Notation (SAN) strings for chess moves based on the move history and current board state. It includes functions to produce move notation with disambiguation, check/checkmate indication, and special moves like castling.

classes.name: Notation
classes.description: A singleton object providing methods to generate SAN notation for moves in a chess game.

methods.name: sanForMove
methods.description: Generates the SAN string for a given move on a specified board, considering move legality, checks, checkmates, castling, promotions, and disambiguation.
